d,d,d,d,d,d,d,d,d,d,d,d,d,d,d,d

DLG ITM_2

DLG SPR_0
I'm a cat

DLG ITM_1
"""
{clr2}{wvy}Breathe in, breathe out,
The ocean lifts me up and down in waves,
My head is lulled into slumber,
I hear a distant whale, a rumble,
Wind howls and rain patters while we lie safe{wvy}{clr2}
"""

DLG ITM_0
"""
{clr2}{wvy}Breathe in, breathe out,
The ocean lifts me up and down in waves,
My head follows your exhale,
I feel the sea breeze, sweep by,
Voices travel from faraway lands and drift over{wvy}{clr2}
"""

DLG ITM_2
"""
{clr2}{wvy}Breathe in, breathe out,
The ocean lifts me up and down in waves,
My head calm as we travel together,
I see the boat we sail, wrapped soft,
Tell me of your journeys tomorrow{wvy}{clr2}
"""

END 0
Breathe out

VAR a
42
